title: Disaster Response Training Design: Optimization Based on Analytic Hierarchy Process

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Training focused on strengthening analytical tool utilization and decision-making competencies for learners in managerial/leadership roles.

learning_goals: Learners can analytically evaluate disaster response training scenarios to derive key improvement elements
Learners can objectively determine training priorities using the Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP) technique
Learners can design and implement simulation-based training programs in team-based settings
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
